species.name: meowth
descriptions: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
Appears to be more active at night. It loves round and shiny things. It can't stop from picking them up.
It is fascinated by round objects. It can't stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

abilities.name: technician
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

abilities.name: rattled
abilities.effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.
